mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_history (session_id, role, content, tokens, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{sessionId}, #{role}, #{content}, #{tokens}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_history SET session_id=#{sessionId}, role=#{role}, content=#{content}, tokens=#{tokens}, user_id=#{userId}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, session_id, role, content, tokens, user_id, create_time FROM chat_history WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, session_id, role, content, tokens, user_id, create_time FROM chat_history ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, session_id, role, content, tokens, user_id, create_time FROM chat_history WHERE user_id=#{userId}
